desc: Proven wrinkle prevention pillow designed by a board-certified plastic surgeon. 17x less facial distortion than a regular pillow. 89% saw improvement in skin.

layout.text: Designed by a board-certified plastic surgeon,  JuveRest® The Sleep Wrinkle Pillow  is an easy-to-use, non-invasive wrinkle solution that minimizes facial wrinkles caused by compression from pillow contact during sleep.
